description.en:
1. Observation practice:
observing group or individual lessons in music school and analysing them. Filling out practice diary and report.
2. Practice lessons: aim is to practice together with mentor.
description.et:
1. Vaatluspraktika sisuks on erinevates vanuseastmetes grupitunni (solfedžo, muusikaliteratuur, ansamblid, orkestrid, jmt)ja/või individuaaltunni vaatlemine ja analüüsimine, etteantud vaatluslehtede täitmine, moodlesse laadimine 
2. Praktikatunnid: Eesmärgiks on saada esimene kogemus individuaal- või rühmatunnis õpetajana.

objectives.en:
The aim of pedagogical practice is to integrate the educational and pedagogic knowledge of students in the reality of a music school; applied form of acquiring instrument teaching skills the main tasks of which are to * integrate theoretical knowledge and pedagogical skills of instrument teaching; * acknowledge the role(s) of a teacher in a real music school in its social and cultural context today; * develop self-consciousness of the student and motivate theoretical studies; * develop the perception of differences due to individuality of students in instructing their creative work, the skills to choose personal sub methodology. Observation practice at a music school: getting an overview of the work of an instrument teacher and of the organization of music school life. 
To widen and develop teaching practices got from the first part of pedagogical practice. Do teach how to motivate and disciplinate groups. To widen and develop instrument teaching skills through practical activity.

description.et: Praktika edasiseks sooritamiseks on nõutav esitada praktikaplaan.

audience.et: Pärimus- ja rütmimuusika eriala pilliõpetaja spetsialiseerumissuuna valinud üliõpilased
